PW

In my opinion that surfaces a problem with StyledText.getLineIndex(int y) which is speced as:
 * The line index returned is always in the range 0..lineCount - 1.

Currently it does not tell which values are allowed and as a result returns arbitrary negative values for (possibly) illegal inputs.

Since I was asking for this API and it is very new, I've added code on my side to guaranteed that the result is 0..lineCount-1 if lineCount > 0 and 0 in all other cases.

Can you clarify the API about the allowed values and if needed fix the negative return values. This is not crucial for M4 since our fix will be in I20051214-0800.
Verified in I20051214-2000 that the workaround is in the Platform Text code.
FH will review the situation and add the appropriate code when he returns.  No action for now.

I fixed this in StyledText. Dani, you should be able to removed your range check now.

fixed in head > 20060105
